items.title: Email and Password Login with OTP Verification
items.description: Implement a login feature where users authenticate using email and password, followed by a one-time password (OTP) sent to their email for verification.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password on the login page
System validates credentials against stored user data
Upon successful credential validation, system sends a unique OTP to the user's registered email
User can enter the OTP within a specified time limit (e.g., 5 minutes)
System verifies the OTP and grants access if valid
Invalid OTP attempts are limited to a maximum of 3 before session reset
dependencies: User database with secure password storage
non_functional: System uptime of 99.9% for authentication services
Passwords stored using strong hashing algorithms (e.g., bcrypt)

notes: Assumed that OTP is mandatory for all logins and that email service is already available or will be integrated.
